name: Sergio Aguero
bio: Sergio Aguero is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a striker for FC Barcelona and the Argentina national team. Known for his goal-scoring prowess, Aguero joined Barcelona from Manchester City in 2021 and has been a key contributor to the team's success.
